pullrequest.title: Add controller examples for physics stress testing

content.raw:
sorry to be a party ppr, while I like the innovative use of number-of-arguments as input, could we [also] support traditional inputs such as below?

~~~
./joint_stress [boring old frequency] [boring old amplitude] [maybe] [one] [more] [after]
~~~
content.html:
sorry to be a party ppr, while I like the innovative use of number-of-arguments as input, could we [also] support traditional inputs such as below?

./joint_stress [boring old frequency] [boring old amplitude] [maybe] [one] [more] [after]
